row.process:
! requires UC4 script variable &UC4RB_CHECKME# ! different Windows variable are set if the object is a directory, a file or doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CHECKME# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@WINDOWS SET CHECKME=&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# SET ISFILE=0 SET ISDIR=0 SET EXIST=0 if exist "%CHECKME%" ( SET EXIST=1 if exist "%CHECKME%\" ( SET ISDIR=1 ) else ( SET ISFILE=1 ) ) else ( SET EXIST=0 )
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# is checked for being a dir/file and if it exist" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "ISDIR(%ISDIR%) ISFILE(%ISFILE%) EXIST(%EXIST%)" echo &UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "------------------------------" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
